BattleEffectText.Name: Blood Enchancement
BattleEffectText.Desc: Damage of Offensive Dice is increased by +{0}% Clear all stacks when landing a successful hit.

BattleEffectText.Name: Exsanguination
BattleEffectText.Desc: At the start fo each Scene, Become Staggered, take 10 Damage and make the Blood Kinght gain 2 Blood Enchancement. This status lasts {0} Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Exsanguination
BattleEffectText.Desc: One speed die become unusable.At the start fo each Scene, take 10 Damage and make the Blood Kinght gain 2 Blood Enchancement. This status lasts {0} Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Exsanguination X
BattleEffectText.Desc: One speed die become unusable.At the start fo each Scene, take 10 Damage and make the Blood Kinght gain 2 Blood Enchancement. This status lasts 2 Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Bounty
BattleEffectText.Desc: Dice of Non-Roy character gain +{0} Power when attacking the character

BattleEffectText.Name: Bounty
BattleEffectText.Desc: Dice of Non-Roy character gain +{0} Power when attacking the character, remove all stacks at the end of each Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Reactive
BattleEffectText.Desc: The Page will be used at last and is unclashable. Can be intercepted by Counter dice or retained Defensive dice.

BattleEffectText.Name: Preemptive
BattleEffectText.Desc: The Page will be used at first

BattleEffectText.Name: Corrosion
BattleEffectText.Desc: If stacks reach 4, take {0} Damage and inflict the character with 2 Fragile this Scene and next Scene. For each stack of Fragile, increase the Damage by 2

BattleEffectText.Name: Repressed Horror
BattleEffectText.Desc: Dice's Maximum Value is reduced by -{0} and their Damage and Stagger Damage is reduced by -{1}%

BattleEffectText.Name: Coalescing Fear
BattleEffectText.Desc: All Pages' cost is increase by 4 but gain Preemptive and attack all enemies

BattleEffectText.Name: Blinded by Radiance
BattleEffectText.Desc: All Dice's minimun roll is reduced by -3 for this Scene

BattleEffectText.Name: Shield
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can block {0} instances of Damage this Scene

BattleEffectText.Name: Shield
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can block {0} instances of Damage

BattleEffectText.Name: Blazing Sun Destination
BattleEffectText.Desc: Becomes Primary Target of "Blazing Sun's Obeisance"

BattleEffectText.Name: The Radiant Knightâ€™s Prowess
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can block Offensive die with at least 15 Power

BattleEffectText.Name: Light Overcharge
BattleEffectText.Desc: At the start of each Scene, recover all Light. The status last {0} Scenes.

BattleEffectText.Name: Amplified Dice
BattleEffectText.Desc: Increase next {0} Dice's Damage and Stagger Damage by +50%

BattleEffectText.Name: Amplified Dice X
BattleEffectText.Desc: Increase next X Dice's Damage and Stagger Damage by +50%

BattleEffectText.Name: Calendula Blossom
BattleEffectText.Desc: At the start of Battlem destroy the Combat Page with most cost set on the Speed Dice, ally "Candle" Knight will recover Light equal to cost of all destroyed Combat Page.
